author: rbb
msg: A bunch of APR BEOS changes.  Including:  Better autoconf support, adding
ap_getopt, adding BEOS portability support.  And, getting it much closer to
the same level as Unix is currently at.

author: rbb
msg: Some more APR funcs, and some changes to the way UNIX handles opening

msg: The closesocket define causes problems on BeOS. Get rid of it where
